head.title: How Yugoslavia Won Fight for Change

hedline.hl1: How Yugoslavia Won Fight for Change

block.p: Ljubisav Djokic, a construction worker, was asked to bring his bulldozer along to a mass demonstration in central Belgrade. When he found himself eye to eye with the police, he said, he decided to finish the job he came to do and advanced on the Parliament building. After 13 years under Slobodan Milosevic, Serbia had risen. It looked chaotic. But more planning lay behind the march on Belgrade than the final tumult suggests. Article, Page 16.

Ljubisav Djokic, a construction worker, was asked to bring his bulldozer along to a mass demonstration in central Belgrade. After 13 years under Slobodan Milosevic, Serbia had risen. It looked chaotic. But more planning lay behind the march on Belgrade than the final tumult suggests. Article, Page 16.
